name: coding-embedded-zephyr-grader
description: Objective, blind, quantitative code grading agent for embedded Zephyr RTOS applications. Produces numerical scorecards across 9 weighted dimensions using automated tools (cppcheck, clang-tidy, lizard, west build, checkpatch, arm-zephyr-eabi-size) and structured rubrics. Supports single-submission grading and A/B blind comparison modes.
